education.desc: Started and Completed Matric in Lentegeur Secondary High Mitchell's Plain.
Started studying N1-N4 Electrical Engineering and completed my studies.
Started and completed an online course on Coursera on Technical Support Fundamentals.
Started studying Software Development at Life Choices Academy.

projects.brief: I was tasked to build a Responsive Portfolio using Bootstrap. I learnt from my mistakes from this project.
This was a my first group exercise and each of us is responsible for each page, mine was the Home page.
This was my draft for ecommerce website as to my design , feel and theme.
This was a group exercise for selling electronic devices and had a add to cart functionality. I enjoyed working in a team.
One of the early Javascript project where I was tasked to use the concepts convered to build this site.
A Javascript project where I had to build a fully functional app to test my understanding.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.message: I enjoy working with her, she is creavtive and gives great assistance.

testimonials.name: Inam Nkabi
testimonials.message: I admire her Time Management Skills and she is not afraid to ask for assistance when needed.

testimonials.name: Xola Bangaza
testimonials.message: She is a great time leader and makes sure that I complete my part in a project.

testimonials.name: Abenathi Sindapi
testimonials.message: She is very honest and offers good feedback, she makes it fun working with her.

testimonials.name: Sidwell Batyi
testimonials.message: She works smoothly in team related activities and gives great advice.

testimonials.name: Meezan Davids
testimonials.message: She is bright and enthusiastic individual who has been steadily improving her skills.
